title: Mobile Learning-Based Knowledge Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (ability to use fundamental smartphone functions)
context.additional_context: Development of practical knowledge management competencies using mobile learning tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Acquiring the ability to design processes for field data collection and real-time experience sharing in mobile environments.
Developing at least two mobile learning scenarios applying knowledge-based learning (K-Learning) and business learning (B-Learning) methodologies.
Proposing integration design strategies for mobile learning platforms and knowledge management systems (KMS) through simulation/VR-based tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
